title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 47 - Use Of Gender-blended Mortality Tables For Individual Life Insurance Policies By Life Insurers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 47 - Use Of Gender-blended Mortality Tables For Individual Life Insurance Policies By Life Insurers

State Regulations
§ 47.0 - Purpose
§ 47.1 - Definitions
§ 47.2 - Construction of gender-blended tables for use in the determination of minimum nonforfeiture benefits and minimum reserves
§ 47.3 - Prohibited discrimination under section 4224(a) of the new york state insurance law
§ 47.4 - Other nondiscrimination statutes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 47

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 4215, 4217, 4221, 4224

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
